Thunderstorm Advisory No. 22 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:59 PM, 21 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac and Metro Manila within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Bulacan(San Rafael, San Ildefonso, Baliuag, Bustos, Pulilan, Angat, Norzagaray, San Jose del Monte, Santa Maria, Bocaue, Pandi, Balagtas, San Miguel), Pampanga(Candaba, San Luis, San Simon, Apalit), Rizal(Antipolo), Bataan(Morong), Cavite(General Emilio Aguinaldo, Indang, Maragondon, Ternate, Imus, Bacoor, General Trias, Silang), Laguna(Santa Rosa, Binan, Mabitac, Santa Maria, Siniloan, Famy), Batangas(Tanauan), Quezon(Gumaca, Lopez, Pitogo, Macalelon, General Luna), Nueva Ecija(San Antonio, Gapan, San Isidro) and Zambales(Iba, Palauig) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
